jd: From: Himanshu Pandey, WISE EQUATION SOLUTION INC himanshu@wiseq.net Reply to: himanshu@wiseq.net Job Title - Tibco Business Events ConsultantLocation - RemoteContract Duration - 12+ Months Job Description:The Tibco Business Events/Java role typically involves designing, developing, and implementing solutions using Tibco Business Events software along with Java programming. Key responsibilities may include: Integration Development: Working on integrating various systems and applications using Tibco's suite of tools.Event Processing: Developing event-driven architectures to monitor and respond to business events in real time.Java Development: Writing and maintaining Java code to support various integrations and business processes.Collaboration: Working closely with cross-functional teams to understand requirements and provide technical solutions.Testing and Deployment: Conducting unit testing, system testing, and deploying applications in a production environment. Qualifications often required for this role include:Experience with Tibco Business Events or similar event processing platforms.Strong Java programming skills.Knowledge of integration patterns and methodologies.Problem-solving abilities and strong analytical skills.Familiarity with agile development practices. Important SkillsetsBusiness Events, Business Works, Data Stax, JMS.Spring Framework in Addition to Business Events & Works Level of Experience10+ Years
